price: Ne remue pas ta langue pour hâter sa récitation [1005] :
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
footnotes: [1005] Allah s’adresse au Prophète: n’essaie pas de composer le Coran avec ta langue pour hâter sa révélation.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
